data.title: The Demolished Man by Bester, Alfred: Good: Moderate signs of wear Paperback: 7" x 4½" (1962) 1959 Edition
data.meta_description: 1959 Edition - Paperback: 7" x 4½" - Panther Books - 1962 - Condition: Good: Moderate signs of wear - © 1953: A stand-alone novel by Alfred Bester. 2nd printing of 1959 edition. Panther Books #933. Originally serialised in Galaxy Science Fiction Magazine January 1952 / February 1952 / March 1952:- Synopsis: In the endless universe nothing is new, nothing is different. There are and have been worlds and cultures without end, each nursing the proud illusion that it is unique in space and time. There have been men without number suffering from the same megalomania: men who imagined themselves unique, irreplaceable, irreproducible. And there will be more. More plus infinity. This is the story of such a time and such a man. The Demolished Man:- (original cost 2'6). - The Demolished Man
data.text:
About this Item

© 1953: A stand-alone novel by Alfred Bester. 2nd printing of 1959 edition. Panther Books #933. Originally serialised in Galaxy Science Fiction Magazine January 1952 / February 1952 / March 1952:- Synopsis: In the endless universe nothing is new, nothing is different. There are and have been worlds and cultures without end, each nursing the proud illusion that it is unique in space and time. There have been men without number suffering from the same megalomania: men who imagined themselves unique, irreplaceable, irreproducible. And there will be more. More plus infinity. This is the story of such a time and such a man. The Demolished Man:- (original cost 2'6). Seller Inventory # 20.063.00002

Terms of Sale:

All books offered for sale are complete and sound (any missing / loose pages or cracked / broken spines will be mentioned in the book description). Our book-seller images are of, not just the listed edition / print, but also of the actual book you will be buying (the cover collages are made from 3 individual scans of each book that are then displayed as a wrap-around image - the books themselves are NOT damaged in any way by this process). Book sizes, where given, are to the nearest ¼". Each boo...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders will usually be shipped within 2 business days. For UK customers this will be by second class post unless otherwise requested. For international / overseas customers charges are based on a 500g book with an extra £2.00 being charged for each additional 250g. Discounts have been put in place for additional items purchased on the same order. All orders are securely and protectively packaged.
